original_text: She used to sit under the palm of Deborah between Ramah and Bethel in the hill country of Ephraim, and the people of Israel came up to her for judgment.
korean_text: 그는 에브라임 산지 라마와 벧엘 사이 드보라의 종려나무 아래에 거주하였고 이스라엘 자손은 그에게 나아가 재판을 받더라

sentences.original_text: She used to sit under the palm of Deborah.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 데보라의 종려나무 아래에 앉곤 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: This was between Ramah and Bethel.
It was in the hill country of Ephraim.
The people of Israel came up to her.
